top_comments.comment: Gigi , you have made a new standard for this song! Connecting the peace and the pain. Powerful and timeless.
Ow! Ang napansin q parang magkamukha sila ni Bea Alonzo?! Or sa paningin q lang o baka Nagkamali lang aq! 🤣🤣🤣 Power of voice Gigigigi.! Love it! 😘😘😘👊👊👊👏👏👏🙏🙏🙏

comments_since_last_sample.body: Idol sna ma notice mo.kantahin mo po sana para sakin yung labis na nasaktan.salamat
Ung ibang singer gigil much sa pagkanta nan ikaw inupuan mo lang iba din Tlaga pag c GIGI ang kumanta😂❤️❤️ idol..😍😍
